message: Some of these responses are unbelievable. Michelle Obama tried to start a good thing to nourish your kids. She can't police what each district puts in their lunches. You are all at choice. If your kids won't eat what's served, let them learn some life skills - make their own lunches at home and quit complaining. Geez!
Wow that's terrible rip

Katie, I am on a long car ride and I just read some people's ignorant comments. Try not to take them personally. I have a horrible chronic physical illness and sometimes to help me through it I just read the comments on news feed and laugh. I think to myself how the hell can some people be so ignorant and judgemental? Lol. Sometimes I will comment, just to try to educate
these are man made.. theres tracks everywhere!!

Sadly, his supporters will blindly believe him. Or say, he is being set up. I hope there are thorough fair investigations of all involved especially Trump and Bannon. Interestingly, VP Pence is very very quiet.....waiting in the wings perhaps?

""""Sunny days, chasing the clouds away..."""" Sesame Street. And """"It's a beautiful day in the neighborhood..."""" Mister Rogers. I'm 50 and these shows, plus the Electric Company, influenced my life and deeply engrained in my happiest memories. Thank you, WNET .
